title: Arial or Helvetica Type Quiz!
content:
I’m sure you’ll all ace this: [http://www.iliveonyourvisits.com/helvetica/](http://web.archive.org/web/20051126211751/http:/www.iliveonyourvisits.com/helvetica/)

I got 8 out of 10 first try, only messing up on the all caps words. My process was comparing the terminals and those that were paralell to the baseline were deemed helvetica and those not were arial. Is this correct? How should one determine the difference in the all caps situation?
author: david bailey
